EPsy 8251 (Fall 2017) Welcome to Andy’s EPsy 8251: Methods in Data Analysis for Educational Research I website. This site is intended to complement the course syllabus by serving as an organizational hub for the course. Here you will be able to access course materials such as readings, notes, assignments, and data sets. It also includes helpful links and resources for each of the course topics. Office Hours Andy Zieffler (zief0002@umn.edu) Tuesday 9:30AM–10:30AM (and by appointment) Education Sciences Building 178 Downloading Materials You can download all of the course materials from the Github repository. Or, you can simply click this link to download a ZIP file of all the materials. Individual files can also be downloaded from the Course Resources page. R and RStudio The course uses R and RStudio. First download and install R from http://www.r-project.org/. Then download and install RStudio from http://www.rstudio.org/.
